column3:
Now bitcoin-qt --help prints

```
...
UI options:
  -choosedatadir            Choose data directory on startup (default: 0)
  -lang=<lang>              Set language, for example "de_DE" (default: system locale)
  -min                      Start minimized
  -rootcertificates=<file>  Set SSL root certificates for payment request (default: -system-)
  -splash                   Show splash sc

Interesting. So qDebug() output goes to stdout/stderr as well?

Edit: oh wait, this is before the messages are redirected.
Ok, now avoiding starting the thread at all before it's needed.\nThis makes it possible to leave the first commit out, although it may still be useful to prevent later surprises...\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4534_33357b27a0f6e344e760caf87e96b577b4c25ad7/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
